rows.label: tlk70000076_03_msg0001
rows.name:
What's the Imperial Army doing in
Gula, you say?

rows.label: tlk70000076_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, we're here to protect His Majesty,
of course.

rows.label: tlk70000076_03_msg0003
rows.name:
But, actually, it seems there's another
reason, as well.

rows.label: tlk70000076_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I've heard rumors, at least. Surveys of
the population, economy, and military
of Gula.

rows.label: tlk70000076_03_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm sure that it's all part of bigger
plan to foster good relations between
Gula and Superbia.

rows.label: tlk70000076_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Diplomacy is useful, but it's a delicate
instrument. You need as much info as
possible.

rows.label: tlk70000076_03_msg0007
rows.name:
To be honest, I'm glad my role doesn't
require me to operate anything more
delicate than my weapon. Hahaha!
